Hi Sarah,

Hope you’re doing well! I wanted to give you a concise status update on Project Falcon and outline what’s coming up next.

Current Status
1. Creative Concepts – Finalized and now in production. First review assets should be ready by the end of this week.
2. Media Planning – ~80 % complete. We expect to have the full draft ready for sign-off early next week.
3. Milestone Timeline – Internal team is aligned; I’ll circulate an updated timeline (with Gantt view) by Wednesday, Jan 26.
4. Roles & Responsibilities – We’ll lock these in during Friday’s meeting so everyone is clear on ownership.
5. Draft Proposal – Still on track for internal review by Feb 1. We’ll share it with you immediately afterward for your feedback.

Risks / Watch-outs
• Resource bandwidth: the design team is juggling multiple sprints, so we’re monitoring capacity closely.
• Launch approvals: we’ll need a quick turnaround from legal once assets are ready.

Immediate Next Steps
• Let’s schedule a 30-min check-in early next week (Mon/Tue). Please let me know your availability.
• Finalize the media plan and updated timeline.
• Begin prepping launch assets for client preview.

If there’s anything I missed or if you’d like a deeper dive into any area, just let me know. Thanks again for your leadership and collaboration—looking forward to keeping the momentum going!

Best,
John
